# Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this journey, I've tried to play with integrity while making strategic moves when necessary. I've valued our conversations and built genuine connections with many of you. When forming alliances, I kept my promises and communicated honestly about my intentions.

I respect P1 as a worthy opponent, but I believe my balanced approach of social awareness and gameplay strategy deserves your consideration.
